extension.description: Reproduce 'Magnet Links' utilizando XBMCtorrent y/o Pulsar.

extension.license: Non commercial. See https://github.com/steeve/plugin.video.pulsar/blob/master/LICENSE
extension.description: Follow @pulsarhq on Twitter

extension.description:
Watch torrents directly from XBMC, without waiting.
To get the latest updates: Twitter: twitter.com/xbmctorrent Facebook: facebook.com/xbmctorrent XBMC HUB: j.mp/xbmctorrent
Modifies XBMCtorrent's scrapers.'
Kodi Underground - Unofficial Kodi repository
